title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server, published to PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package.

title: ollama package on npm
summary: npm landing page for the official ollama JavaScript package.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama as an LLM provider for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: langchain-community/embeddings/ollama
summary: LangChain embeddings interface for Ollama, enabling local embedding models in vector-RAG workflows.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, packaged as a Docker container with file upload, multi-model chat, and admin panel.

title: ollama-webui on npm
summary: npm mirror of the Ollama WebUI frontend assets.

title: ollama-rag/ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a local RAG pipeline with Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Simple Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models from Slack.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama run with readline history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing integrations.

title: Hacker News: Ollama 0.1.32 release
summary: Discussion thread covering new model support, performance tweaks, and Docker improvements in v0.1.32.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Experimental Vim plugin that adds local AI copilot suggestions via Ollama.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and fine-tunes compatible with Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama for local LLM conversations.
